Kali:

"Agree"said the femme"I'm looking for a neutral place in order to 
have a meeting"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> Belthassan felt a disturbance in the flow of the Matrix. He barely 
> listened to Kali, but he shook off the feeling.
> 
> Belthassan: Huh? Neutral zone? Oh, yes, that's right... I'll patch 
you 
> with Thrust, another warrior. Please tell him where you want to 
meet 
> our representative. I need to attend another pressing matter.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Kali:::
> > 
> > "Will you be agree if the meeting be in a neutral zone??"said the 
> > femme

> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > > Belthassan: You have some good points. I will send one of my 
> > warrior 
> > > so she can discuss more about an alliance between us. I need 
your 
> > > position so I can send her to you.

> > Report 
> > > to the base at once.

if

> > > > rather we can offer an alliance and exchange tech-reseach and

> > > > suppor in case that some of us were attacked."

made

> > > > > enemies yet, and I am convinced that fighting your enemies 
> will

> > > > > hatred on us. We are not innocent bystanders, but we are 
> > neutrals, 
> > > > and 
> > > > > I intend to stay as long as possible. If you want to try to 
> > > > convince 
> > > > > me, I am ready to hear your arguments.

team
